abstract: In his first TV interview after putting himself into the gun control debate, Mr. Costas will appear on “The Last Word” with Lawrence O’Donnell.
snippet: In his first TV interview after putting himself into the gun control debate, Mr. Costas will appear on “The Last Word” with Lawrence O’Donnell.
lead_paragraph: Bob Costas will appear as a guest on “The Last Word,” the MSNBC program hosted by Lawrence O’Donnell, on Tuesday night at 10 p.m.

headline.main: Bob Costas, Gun Rights Commentator and Sportscaster, to Appear on MSNBC
